summary: During a babysitting gig, a high-school student is harassed by an increasingly threatening prank caller.
cast: Camilla Belle|Tommy Flanagan|Katie Cassidy|Tessa Thompson|Brian Geraghty|Clark Gregg|Derek de Lint|Kate Jennings Grant|David Denman|Arthur Young|Madeline Carroll|Steve Eastin|John Bobek|Brad Surosky|Karina Logue|Rosine 'Ace' Hatem|Escher Holloway|Molly Bryant|John Waugh|Owen H.M. Smith|Jessica Helmer|Lillie West|Lance Henriksen|Dianna Agron|Andrew Aguilar|Amber McConnell|Zara McDowell
title: Cuando llama un extraño
